outputs.output_descr: The capacity of the Government for the implementation of the public sector reforms strengthened through contributing to transformational change of supported institutions.
Management capacities of CCG developed through improved HR and document flow systems and strengthened in-house training and analysis potential.
The capacity of the Government for the implementation of the public sector reforms strengthened through contributing to cultural change within supported public agencies.

project_descr: Governance Reform Fund (GRF) project serves the overall objective of further strengthening capacities of the Government of Georgia and increasing its effectiveness and efficiency.
